56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, on the day of the Conquest of Mecca, "There is no migration (after the Conquest), but Jihad and good intentions, and when you are called for Jihad, you should immediately respond to the call

chapter.eng-name: There is no emigration after the Conquest
